## Installation

You can install the development version of `{nflendzoneApp}` from [GitHub](https://github.com/TylerPollard410/nflendzoneApp):

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("TylerPollard410/nflendzoneApp")
```

## Run

You can launch the application by running:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
nflendzoneApp::run_app()
```
